subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “a kind of big bean”
: Cognate with {{cog|my|ညံ||the legume {{taxlink|Sesbania cannabina|species}}}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

; “soft; weak”
: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*njam||soft}}. Cognate with {{cog|my|ညံ့||soft}}, {{cog|lus|nêm||soft}}. Outside Sino-Tibetan, compare {{cog|th|นุ่ม||soft}}.
: Possibly related to {{och-l|飪|cooked}}, {{och-l|腍|cooked; delicious}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|內荏|外厲內荏|韶光荏苒|荏染|色厲內荏|風塵荏苒|荏弱|苒荏|荏苒}}
